text: Olanzapine (also Zyprexa) is an anti-psychotic medicine for bipolar disorder and schizophrenia. It can also treat anxiety conditions. It is also widely used 'off-label' for prevention of chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting Eli Lilly manufactured the original medicine, which is now widely available in generic form from many companies. ==References== Category:Drugs used in psychiatry Category:Organonitrogen compounds Category:Organosulfur compounds
title: Olanzapine
